snippet.title: Wanderstop and Cozy Games with Creator Davey Wreden | PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
Wanderstop creator Davey Wreden discusses his attempt to make a cozy game, and it how it transformed into a game about the complicated process of healing. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1299460/Wanderstop/
https://www.pcgamer.com

We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
